actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To require periodic maintenance dredging for the Greenville Inner Harbor Channel, Mississippi.

summary.text: Deems the Greenville Inner Harbor, Mississippi, to be a portion of the navigable waters of the United States for which the Secretary of the Army maintains a ten-foot navigable channel.

titles.title: To require periodic maintenance dredging for the Greenville Inner Harbor Channel, Mississippi.
